synopsis.text: One day, in the bustling city of Tokyo, siblings Hayato and Hina stumble upon a captivating blue feather. Intrigued and eager to discover its owner, the close-knit duo embarks on a journey guided by an enigmatic crow. As they traverse through their urban surroundings, Hayato and Hina encounter a diverse array of birds that aid them in their search. Will their quest lead them to the feather's rightful owner, or uncover unexpected surprises along the way? Join the siblings as they navigate this heartwarming adventure, forging new friendships and strengthening their bond.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
